verses.text: And it came to pass, when \w Jabin|strong="H2985"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Hazor|strong="H2674"\w* had \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* \add those things\add*, that he \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* to \w Jobab|strong="H3103"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Madon|strong="H4068"\w*, and to the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Shimron|strong="H8110"\w*, and to the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Achshaph|strong="H0407"\w*,

And to the \w kings|strong="H4428"\w* that \add were\add* on the \w north|strong="H6828"\w* of the \w mountains|strong="H2022"\w*, and of the \w plains|strong="H6160"\w* \w south|strong="H5045"\w* of \w Chinneroth|strong="H3672"\w*, and in the \w valley|strong="H8219"\w*, and in the \w borders|strong="H5299"\w* of \w Dor|strong="H1756"\w* on the \w west|strong="H3220"\w*,

\add And to\add* the \w Canaanite|strong="H3669"\w* on the \w east|strong="H4217"\w* and on the \w west|strong="H3220"\w*, and \add to\add* the \w Amorite|strong="H0567"\w*, and the \w Hittite|strong="H2850"\w*, and the \w Perizzite|strong="H6522"\w*, and the \w Jebusite|strong="H2983"\w* in the \w mountains|strong="H2022"\w*, and \add to\add* the \w Hivite|strong="H2340"\w* under \w Hermon|strong="H2768"\w* in the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of \w Mizpeh|strong="H4709"\w*.

And they went \w out|strong="H3318"\w*, they and all their \w hosts|strong="H4264"\w* with them, \w much|strong="H7227"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, even as the \w sand|strong="H2344"\w* that \add is\add* upon the \w sea|strong="H3220"\w* \w shore|strong="H8193"\w* in \w multitude|strong="H7230"\w*, with \w horses|strong="H5483"\w* and \w chariots|strong="H7393"\w* \w very|strong="H3966"\w* \w many|strong="H7227"\w*.

And when all these \w kings|strong="H4428"\w* were met \w together|strong="H3259"\w*, they \w came|strong="H0935"\w* and \w pitched|strong="H2583"\w* \w together|strong="H3162"\w* at the \w waters|strong="H4325"\w* of \w Merom|strong="H4792"\w*, to \w fight|strong="H3898"\w* against \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*.\f + \fr 11.5 \ft met…: Heb. assembled by appointment\f*

¶ And the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto \w Joshua|strong="H3091"\w*, Be not \w afraid|strong="H3372"\w* \w because|strong="H6440"\w* of them: for to \w morrow|strong="H4279"\w* about this \w time|strong="H6256"\w* will I deliver them \w up|strong="H5414"\w* all \w slain|strong="H2491"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*: thou shalt \w hough|strong="H6131"\w* their \w horses|strong="H5483"\w*, and \w burn|strong="H8313"\w* their \w chariots|strong="H4818"\w* with \w fire|strong="H0784"\w*.

So \w Joshua|strong="H3091"\w* \w came|strong="H0935"\w*, and all the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* of \w war|strong="H4421"\w* with him, against them by the \w waters|strong="H4325"\w* of \w Merom|strong="H4792"\w* \w suddenly|strong="H6597"\w*; and they fell \w upon|strong="H5307"\w* them.

And the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w delivered|strong="H5414"\w* them into the \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, who \w smote|strong="H5221"\w* them, and \w chased|strong="H7291"\w* them unto \w great|strong="H7227"\w* \w Zidon|strong="H6721"\w*, and unto \w Misrephoth-maim|strong="H4956"\w*, and unto the \w valley|strong="H1237"\w* of \w Mizpeh|strong="H4708"\w* \w eastward|strong="H4217"\w*; and they \w smote|strong="H5221"\w* them, until they \w left|strong="H7604"\w* them none \w remaining|strong="H8300"\w*.\f + \fr 11.8 \ft great Zidon: or, Zidonrabbah\f*\f + \fr 11.8 \ft Misrephoth-maim: or, Salt pits: Heb. Burnings of waters\f*

And \w Joshua|strong="H3091"\w* \w did|strong="H6213"\w* unto them as the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w bade|strong="H0559"\w* him: he \w houghed|strong="H6131"\w* their \w horses|strong="H5483"\w*, and \w burnt|strong="H8313"\w* their \w chariots|strong="H4818"\w* with \w fire|strong="H0784"\w*.

¶ And \w Joshua|strong="H3091"\w* at that \w time|strong="H6256"\w* turned \w back|strong="H7725"\w*, and \w took|strong="H3920"\w* \w Hazor|strong="H2674"\w*, and \w smote|strong="H5221"\w* the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* thereof with the \w sword|strong="H2719"\w*: for \w Hazor|strong="H2674"\w* \w beforetime|strong="H6440"\w* was the \w head|strong="H7218"\w* of all those \w kingdoms|strong="H4467"\w*.

And they \w smote|strong="H5221"\w* all the \w souls|strong="H5315"\w* that \add were\add* therein with the \w edge|strong="H6310"\w* of the \w sword|strong="H2719"\w*, utterly \w destroying|strong="H2763"\w* \add them:\add* there was not any \w left|strong="H3498"\w* to \w breathe|strong="H5397"\w*: and he \w burnt|strong="H8313"\w* \w Hazor|strong="H2674"\w* with \w fire|strong="H0784"\w*.\f + \fr 11.11 \ft any…: Heb. any breath\f*

And all the \w cities|strong="H5892"\w* of those \w kings|strong="H4428"\w*, and all the \w kings|strong="H4428"\w* of them, did \w Joshua|strong="H3091"\w* \w take|strong="H3920"\w*, and \w smote|strong="H5221"\w* them with the \w edge|strong="H6310"\w* of the \w sword|strong="H2719"\w*, \add and\add* he utterly \w destroyed|strong="H2763"\w* them, as \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* the \w servant|strong="H5650"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w*.

But \add as for\add* the \w cities|strong="H5892"\w* that \w stood|strong="H5975"\w* still in their \w strength|strong="H8510"\w*, \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w burned|strong="H8313"\w* none of them, \w save|strong="H2108"\w* \w Hazor|strong="H2674"\w* only; \add that\add* did \w Joshua|strong="H3091"\w* \w burn|strong="H8313"\w*.\f + \fr 11.13 \ft in their…: Heb. on their heap\f*

And all the \w spoil|strong="H7998"\w* of these \w cities|strong="H5892"\w*, and the \w cattle|strong="H0929"\w*, the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* took for a \w prey|strong="H0962"\w* unto themselves; but every \w man|strong="H0120"\w* they \w smote|strong="H5221"\w* with the \w edge|strong="H6310"\w* of the \w sword|strong="H2719"\w*, until they had \w destroyed|strong="H8045"\w* them, neither \w left|strong="H7604"\w* they any to \w breathe|strong="H5397"\w*.

¶ As the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* his \w servant|strong="H5650"\w*, so did \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w command|strong="H6680"\w* \w Joshua|strong="H3091"\w*, and so \w did|strong="H6213"\w* \w Joshua|strong="H3091"\w*; he \w left|strong="H5493"\w* \w nothing|strong="H1697"\w* \w undone|strong="H5493"\w* of all that the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*.  +  r 11.15  t left…: Heb. removed nothing *

So \w Joshua|strong="H3091"\w* \w took|strong="H3947"\w* all that \w land|strong="H0776"\w*, the \w hills|strong="H2022"\w*, and all the south \w country|strong="H5045"\w*, and all the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of \w Goshen|strong="H1657"\w*, and the \w valley|strong="H8219"\w*, and the \w plain|strong="H6160"\w*, and the \w mountain|strong="H2022"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, and the \w valley|strong="H8219"\w* of the same;

\add Even\add* from the \w mount|strong="H2022"\w* \w Halak|strong="H2510"\w*, that goeth \w up|strong="H5927"\w* to \w Seir|strong="H8165"\w*, even unto \w Baal-gad|strong="H1171"\w* in the \w valley|strong="H1237"\w* of \w Lebanon|strong="H3844"\w* under \w mount|strong="H2022"\w* \w Hermon|strong="H2768"\w*: and all their \w kings|strong="H4428"\w* he \w took|strong="H3920"\w*, and \w smote|strong="H5221"\w* them, and \w slew|strong="H4191"\w* them.\f + \fr 11.17 \ft the mount…: or, the smooth mountain\f*
\w Joshua|strong="H3091"\w* \w made|strong="H6213"\w* \w war|strong="H4421"\w* a \w long|strong="H7227"\w* \w time|strong="H3117"\w* with all those \w kings|strong="H4428"\w*.

There was not a \w city|strong="H5892"\w* that made \w peace|strong="H7999"\w* with the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, save the \w Hivites|strong="H2340"\w* the \w inhabitants|strong="H3427"\w* of \w Gibeon|strong="H1391"\w*: all \add other\add* they \w took|strong="H3947"\w* in \w battle|strong="H4421"\w*.

For it was of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* to \w harden|strong="H2388"\w* their \w hearts|strong="H3820"\w*, that they should come \w against|strong="H7125"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* in \w battle|strong="H4421"\w*, that he might destroy them \w utterly|strong="H2763"\w*, \add and\add* that they might have no \w favour|strong="H8467"\w*, but that he might \w destroy|strong="H8045"\w* them, as the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*.

¶ And at that \w time|strong="H6256"\w* \w came|strong="H0935"\w* \w Joshua|strong="H3091"\w*, and cut \w off|strong="H3772"\w* the \w Anakims|strong="H6062"\w* from the \w mountains|strong="H2022"\w*, from \w Hebron|strong="H2275"\w*, from \w Debir|strong="H1688"\w*, from \w Anab|strong="H6024"\w*, and from all the \w mountains|strong="H2022"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*, and from all the \w mountains|strong="H2022"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*: \w Joshua|strong="H3091"\w* destroyed them \w utterly|strong="H2763"\w* with their \w cities|strong="H5892"\w*.

There was none of the \w Anakims|strong="H6062"\w* \w left|strong="H3498"\w* in the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*: only in \w Gaza|strong="H5804"\w*, in \w Gath|strong="H1661"\w*, and in \w Ashdod|strong="H0795"\w*, there \w remained|strong="H7604"\w*.

So \w Joshua|strong="H3091"\w* \w took|strong="H3947"\w* the whole \w land|strong="H0776"\w*, according to all that the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w said|strong="H1696"\w* unto \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*; and \w Joshua|strong="H3091"\w* \w gave|strong="H5414"\w* it for an \w inheritance|strong="H5159"\w* unto \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* according to their \w divisions|strong="H4256"\w* by their \w tribes|strong="H7626"\w*. And the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* \w rested|strong="H8252"\w* from \w war|strong="H4421"\w*.
